question: All flowers are plants. Some plants are flowering plants. Which conclusion is logically valid?

In each of the following questions, a word is transformed into another word by applying a specific alphabetical pattern to each of its letters. Identify the logic used in the first pair and apply the same logic to the second word to determine the correct answer. DREAM: GRDBM :: MAGIC:?

Input: 42 kite 93 balloon 37 lemon orange 64
Step 1: 93 kite 42 balloon 37 lemon orange 64
Step II: 93 balloon kite 42 37 lemon orange 64
Step III: 93 balloon 64 kite 42 37 lemon orange
Step IV: 93 balloon 64 lemon kite 42 37 orange
Step V: 93 balloon 64 lemon 42 kite 37 orange
Step VI: 93 balloon 64 lemon 42 orange kite 37
Question: What is the logic behind the arrangement?
option_1: Largest number to front, then alternate word/number shifts
option_2: Words alphabetically left, numbers descending right
option_3: Numbers and words arranged alternately by rank
option_4: Numbers descending left; words in reverse alphabetical order right

In a certain code, A + B means A is the mother of B, A x B means A is the father of B, A - B means A is the sister of B, what does P x Q - R mean?
option_1: P is the father of Q and Q is the sister of R
option_2: Q is the sister of R and Q is the sister of R
option_3: R is the father of P and Q is the sister of R
option_4: P is the brother of R and Q is the sister of R

question: Four friends X, Y, Z, and W each have some marbles. X gives Y as many marbles as he already has, gives Z twice the amount of marbles Z already has, and gives W thrice the amount of marbles W already has. Then, W gives 1/6th of his marbles to Y. Afterward, X gives 10% of the marbles he now owns to Z and 20% to Y. Finally, all of them have 50 marbles each. What was the original number of marbles each friend had?

Compare the following two addresses.
Address 1: Ms. Neha Verma, Flat No. 204, Tower B, Green Acres, Pune 411045
Address 2: Mrs. Neha Verma, Flat No. 204, Tower B, Green Acres Society, Pune - 411045

Are these likely to be the same?
option_1: No, city codes do not match
option_2: Yes, all details match except name titles
option_3: No, the flat numbers are different
option_4: No, the name titles are different

Input: cat 90 24 tree 48 75 flower bush
